column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bolin says : " So how long as it been since you two have seen each other ? "
#Text=Toph says : " Little while now .
#Text=" Toph says : " Ah , time flies when you get to be my age .
#Text=I 'm surprised you came to save Su .
#Text=I thought you guys did n't get along .
#Text=" Lin says : " Su and I finally worked out our old grievances .
#Text=" Toph says : " Good , glad we can put all that behind us .
#Text=" Lin says : " Right .
#Text=" We " .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Okay , there 's the factory .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Whoa , that 's one big ... thing .
#Text=" Toph says : " I think I know where they are .
#Text=Feel that cavern a few stories down ?
#Text=It seems empty , but it 's guarded by an awful lot of mech .
#Text=" Lin says : " Right .
#Text=Why would you need soldiers guarding an empty cavern ?
#Text=They must have them in some kind of suspended prison , so they ca n't use their earthbending .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Someone 's coming .
#Text=Hide !
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " I did n't expect you until tomorrow .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " I just wanted to check in to make sure everything was on track .
#Text=It looks wonderful .
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " We 've had a few minor malfunctions , but we should be ready for the test tomorrow .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " You 've been working on this the entire time , Zhu Li .
#Text=What do you think the problem is ?
#Text=" Zhu Li says : " It 's a very complex machine .
#Text=There are bound to be some bugs to work out .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " But you 're doing everything you can to fix those , correct ?
#Text=" Zhu Li says : " Of course , your eminence .
#Text="
